short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add time spent (0.25 day increments) to issues in your Github project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track time spent working on issues in your Github project wall.

This extension adds buttons to the issue popups on the project walls allowing you to add 0.25 day increments to your issues to track time spent on cards.
